name: Loop of Eternity
description:
Made in 30 hours (pure) for Ludum Dare #37 (One Room)

You were flying on your way back home, but got entrapped into mage's room, which is called "Loop of Eternity"! Now you have to defeat various spaceships in a rogue-like game with always increasing difficulty and fun!

Core mechanics of the game are the "Slow-Motion" and gun's "Overheating" effects in conjunction with the powerful Shop upgrades!

Controls:
-> Esc - Pause + Access to the Shop (don't forget to visit it!);
-> Hold Space for shooting;
-> Shift - Slow-Motion on/off;
-> Up/Down Arrow keys - movement;
